desc: BEST DRY SHAMPOO ALTERNATIVE FOR SWEATY HAIR AFTER WORKOUT! No-Rinse Hair Wash fixes your post-workout hair without showering. Signature enzyme neutralize bacteria and smells from sweat, amino acids strengthen hair, green tea and chamomile extracts soothe scalp. FOR ALL HAIR TYPES! Curly, Coily (3A - 4C)Wavy/Straight

layout.text: Simply apply according to your hair texture!
